name: MISONR BCS Section 05 Finance
description: OAS0021 v1.0 Report to show BCS Section 5 answers for the selected establishment.

dataset.name: MIS Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, INITIALS, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: S5 Finance
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.RECEPTION_DATE, BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.INITIATION_DATE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION5.MONEY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION5.BENEFITS, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION5.ACCOUNTS, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION5.S5_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED FROM ASSESSMENT, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID, BCS_PART_STATUS, OFFENDER, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION5, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY, PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON WHERE (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = ASSESSMENT.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID AND ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_TYPE_ELM = 'TR_BCS') AND (PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PURPOSE) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION5.ASSESSMENT_ID) AND (BCS_PART_STATUS.BCS_PART_STATUS_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_STATUS) AND (SUBSTR(OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, 1, 10) = TAGMIS_CASELOAD_SECURITY((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */), OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AND ((REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.LATEST_OWNERSHIP_RANK = 1) AND BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION = 'Complete' AND REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.PHYSICAL_LOCATION IN (SELECT LOCATION FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for Physical Location:','A','Offender History\Physical Location',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.DESCRIPTION IN ('Basic Custody Screening - Start', 'Basic Custody Screening - Review'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT_ID, BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, RECEPTION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, INITIATION_DATE, MONEY, BENEFITS, ACCOUNTS, S5_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN MONEY = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S5_MONEY FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID_FOR_FILTER IN (1))

field.name: $ref:V_OFFENDER_SURNAME
field.display: B5.1 Do you get money every week/month?

field.name: $ref:V_S5_BENEFITS
field.display: B5.4 Do you have a bank/post office/credit union account?

field.name: $ref:V_S5_ACCOUNTS
field.display:
B5.5 Is Finance an issue which needs addressing? 
[For the screener to consider]

field.name: $ref:V_S5_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED
field.legacySql: =If([S5 Issue To Be Addressed]=0;"No";(If([S5 Issue To Be Addressed]=1;"Yes";"Don't Know")))
